definition: to reside/to be (in a certain position)/to store up/to be at a standstill/residence/house/restaurant/classifier for bedrooms
(archaic) sentence-final particle expressing a doubting attitude
to leave (a message etc)/to retain/to stay/to remain/to keep/to preserve
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]

sentences.english: He asked for extension of his residence permit .
sentences.chinese: 他要求延长居留证的期限。

sentences.english: Temporary foreigners' residence permits shall be issued to those residing in China for less than a year.
sentences.chinese: 外国人临时居留证，发给在中国居留不满一年的人员。

sentences.english: Assist the FT to apply for a Foreigner Residence Permit.
sentences.chinese: 协助外师申请《外国人居留证》。

sentences.english: Also submit one copy of your passport or that of your ARC.
sentences.chinese: 请缴交护照或是居留证影本。

sentences.english: After the expiry , the residence permit should be renewed on time with the school letter of introduction .
sentences.chinese: 居留证期满后应持学校介绍信按时办理延期手续。

sentences.english: An alien who has lost his /her residence card shall declare the lost card invalid in an official local newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 遗失外国人居留证的，须在当地政府报纸上声明作废。

sentences.english: One photocopy of the front and back of the Alien Resident Certificate.
sentences.chinese: 外侨居留证正反面影本各乙份。

sentences.english: A test-taker should present either a valid passport with photo attached or an ARC card to the test centers.
sentences.chinese: 请携带附有照片的护照或居留证正本到试场参加考试。

sentences.english: A test-taker should present either a valid passport or an ARC card to the test center.
sentences.chinese: 请携带护照或居留证正本到试场参加考试。

sentences.english: He have applied for a reside nce permit.
sentences.chinese: 他已为获得居留证作了申请。

sentences.english: Please show me your passport and alien residential certificate.
sentences.chinese: 请出示你的护照和外国人居留证。

sentences.english: Illegal immigrants can regularize their position by obtaining the necessary residence permit .
sentences.chinese: 非法移民获得必要的居留证后即可使身分合法。

sentences.english: Aliens' temporary residence cards are issued to those who stay less than one year in China.
sentences.chinese: 外国人临时居留证，发给在中国居留不满1年的人员。

sentences.english: Aliens must have their passports and residence permits with them for inspection.
sentences.chinese: 外国人需随身携带护照和居留证以备查验。

sentences.english: He have applied for a residence permit.
sentences.chinese: 他已为获得居留证作了申请。

sentences.english: Excuse me, may I check your residence permit?
sentences.chinese: 对不起，我可以检查一下您的居留证吗？

definition: permanent residency permit (originally referred specifically to the US green card)
Mainland Travel Permit for Taiwan Residents/Taiwan Compatriot Entry Permit/abbr. for 台灣居民來往大陸通行證|台湾居民来往大陆通行证[Tai2 wan1 Ju1 min2 Lai2 wang3 Da4 lu4 Tong1 xing2 zheng4]
permanent resident/person with the right to live in a country or territory
Schengen, village in Luxemburg, location of the 1985 signing of the agreement to create the Schengen area 申根區|申根区[Shen1 gen1 qu1]
to become naturalized/to become a citizen
(Tw) to be in the care of one's relatives/to be dependent on a relative/to draw on family connections
overseas Chinese/persons of Chinese origin having foreign citizenship
